Package controllers

Class AddProductController

java.lang.Object
controllers.AddProductController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddProductController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Adds product to main product list. Covers error checking and validation. Adds associated parts to the product as well

    • addAssociatedPart

      void addAssociatedPart​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Add associated Part to the associated parts list. This is then added to the product when product is saved.
      Parameters:
      event - this is the event of the button pressed.

    • cancelProduct

      void cancelProduct​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      cancels product. No product is created when the button is pressed and you return to the main menu
      Parameters:
      event - this is the button clicked that triggers the cancel product function
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - this is thrown when the scene is not loaded.

    • removeAssociatedPart

      void removeAssociatedPart​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Removes associated part from the product.
      Parameters:
      event - When this button is clicked the part is removed.

    • saveProduct

      void saveProduct​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Saves the product and adds it to the inventory product list.
      Parameters:
      event - This button saves the product and sends the user back to the main menu.

    • searchPart

      void searchPart​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Searches a part so the user can add it to the associated parts list.
      Parameters:
      event - When pressed, this button will filter the table and show results that contain the searched word.

    • isNumeric

      public static boolean isNumeric​(java.lang.String str)
      Checks if the string is a number or not.
      Parameters:
      str - The string that is going to be checked.
      Returns:
      a boolean if the string is a number or not.
